aboutText: As an ambitious IT student, I'm eager to apply my theoretical knowledge in a practical setting. My academic projects have given me solid foundations in programming and system design.
What sets me apart is my quick learning ability, attention to detail, and passion for technology. I thrive in team environments where I can both contribute and learn from others.
Currently looking for an internship or junior position where I can grow my skills while adding value to your team.
